attr.title: Tiny World Racing
attr.desc: Blast your way through a variety of environments in 20 tracks across 5 different tournaments. From crumbling castles to volcanic islands, you'll need to master all kinds of terrain to become the world's best racer.
attr.inst: Purchase the full game at itch.io (https://ci.itch.io/tiny-world-racing). Download and extract the 'Tiny World Racing - as a compressed ZIP' version, and copy the game files to this port's gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the full game at [itch.io](https://ci.itch.io/tiny-world-racing). Download and extract the *Tiny World Racing - as a compressed ZIP* version, and copy the game files to this port's *gamedata* folder.
